zserio.runtime.io

Class ByteArrayBitStreamReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • zserio.runtime.io.ByteArrayBitStreamReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, BitStreamReader
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ValidationBitStreamReader

    public class ByteArrayBitStreamReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements BitStreamReader
    A bit stream reader using byte array.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int bitOffset
      The current bit offset.
      protected static byte BYTE_MOD_MASK
      Byte value used for modulus calculations.

      The current byte position.

      The default character set.

      Constructs object containing given bytes with a given byte order with exact bit size.

      • readVarInt

        public long readVarInt()
                throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: BitStreamReader
        Reads a signed variable integer from the bit stream. The integer takes up to 9 bytes to cover range <-2^63, 2^63-1>.
        Specified by:
        readVarInt in interface BitStreamReader
        Returns:
        Read signed VarInt value.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If reading failed.

      • checkRange

        protected static void checkRange(int numBits)
                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Checks if the given numBits value is situated in the range 0 to 64.
        Parameters:
        numBits - Number of bits to check.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the numBits value is smaller than zero or greater than 64.
